festival.introText:
INTRODUCING:

FESTIVA Great Harwood

The Ultimate 'All inclusive' Family Festival Experience

A spectacular festival packed with 12 ‘top’ tributes, dozens of inflatables of all sizes, Silcock Fairground - Circus 250 in the Big Top! An incredible freestyle motocross tricks show along with a Dinosaurs adventure and a packed program for kids. Topped with 3 large ‘World Foods and Beers’ marquees. Plus, much more!

1 ticket unlocks all rides, attractions & entertainment unlimited use
festival.descriptionText: Skiddle is an official ticket outlet of Festiva 2023. Get Festiva Festival tickets, news and information with Skiddle.com
festival.location: The Great Harwood Showground in Blackburn

location.address: The Great Harwood Showground, Whalley Road, Great Harwood
